text: Ransom Joseph "Randy" Jackson (February 10, 1926 – March 20, 2019) was an American Major League Baseball (MLB) player. He played for the Chicago Cubs (1950–1955), Los Angeles Dodgers (1956–1958; two seasons in Brooklyn, one in Los Angeles), Cleveland Indians (1958–1959), and ended his career back with the Cubs (1959). Jackson died at his home in Athens, Georgia on March 20, 2019, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== *Randy Jackson bio @ WhenitwasaGame.net *Info @ BaseballLibrary.com *Stats @ Baseball-Almanac.com Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Brooklyn Dodgers players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Sportspeople from Little Rock, Arkansas
title: Randy Jackson (baseball)
